title: Arabic Speaking Banking Sales Officer
desc: We are seeking a talented and motivated UI/UX Designer to join our team. Core responsibilities include user interaction design, based on research and analysis in order to communicate design motivations/decisions to various stakeholders.
requirements: Candidate MUST be employed within the UAE
Candidate MUST have experience handling voice calls, Emails, Web-chat, Whatsapp Chatbot & SMS
Candidate MUST be bi-lingual, preferably tri-lingual or more
Candidate MUST be open to rolling shifts or extended hours when & if required
Available on an immediate basis or have a notice period of 1 Week
